title.rendered: What’s new with iPhone 15 Pro Max: Powerful A17 chip, 10x periscope camera

content.rendered:
New name iPhone 15 Ultra

Apple is expected to replace the “Pro Max” version of the iPhone 15 Pro Max with a new “Ultra” model. In 2022, Apple introduced the Apple Watch Ultra . That’s why the most advanced iPhone available, usually “Pro Max”, can be renamed the iPhone 15 Ultra. Apple may replace the iPhone 15’s “Pro Max” with

Unique wine red color

According to leaked information, the iPhone 15 Pro Max version will have a wine red color. This is probably the intention to expand Apple’s exclusive color palette, but undeniably this color is really attractive, eye-catching as well as exuding a luxurious aura. iPhone 15 Pro Max version will have a unique wine red color

New design with Titanium bezel

According to some unofficial sources, it is expected that the iPhone 15 Pro Max will be equipped with a frame made of Titanium. The back of the device is also gently curved at the corners. Therefore, this upgrade will make the product more impressive. This change is intended to make the iPhone easier to hold and use now, eliminating the painful hand-holding iPhone labels – something that happened in previous lines. New design with impressive Titanium bezel

Periscope camera up to 10x

There have been many rumors about Apple working on “periscope” telephoto lens technology and this type of lens could be introduced on the iPhone 2023. Specifically, only the larger iPhone 15 Pro Max has a periscope camera lens . hope , so it will probably be limited to the highest-end and most expensive model. Periscope camera allows up to 10x . optical zoom Periscope technology provides optical zoom far beyond what is possible with a standard telephoto lens, enabling up to 10x zoom. With the periscope lens, the iPhone’s zooming capabilities will be greatly enhanced as current Pro models are limited to 3x zoom.

Main camera up to 48MP with LiDAR . sensor

The most special feature is located in the back camera cluster. Specifically, this product will own a new convex camera cluster because their sensor has been upgraded to 48 MP like the iPhone 14 Pro and iPhone 14 Pro Max . iPhone 15 Pro Max has a main camera of up to 48MP with LiDAR sensor According to previous predictions, the LiDAR sensor will now support the rear camera cluster in recognizing the market and other spatial conditions. Thereby increasing the ability to recognize the image area of ​​​​the shot and improve the image quality even more.

The world’s thinnest edge-to-edge screen

Apple’s latest iPhone Pro Max series of phones will also mark the first time with a 1.55mm bezel, beating the previous records of Xiaomi and Samsung phones when they stopped at 1.67mm and 1.81 respectively. mm. The thin bezel screen makes the iPhone screen more beautiful This thin border screen will also make the iPhone screen now look wider and more beautiful, completely different from the old 2.17mm border in its predecessors.

Chip A17 Bionic 3nm

Breakthrough improvements from the upcoming iPhone 15 series phones are expected to benefit multitasking, allowing multiple apps to be opened in the background at once on iPhone. In particular, the new 3nm A17 Bionic chip will also help optimize the overall performance of the device. The new 3nm A17 Bionic chip helps to optimize the device’s performance Thanks to this new chip, the iPhone 15 Pro Max will become the first iPhone to use a chip manufactured on the 3nm process. It seems that Apple is very confident about the performance on its new processor. The chip is expected to save 20% battery compared to the current A16 Bionic chip.

Improvements in RAM

Previously, there were some rumors that the iPhone 15 Pro Max would come with 8GB RAM instead of 6GB like the iPhone 14 Pro phone . Meanwhile, both iPhone 15 and iPhone 15 Plus versions still have 6GB of RAM. iPhone 15 Pro Max will come with 8GB RAM With this powerful new RAM, the iPhone’s ability to store background programs will now increase even more. From there, the user experience is much higher than before.

Fast charging with USB-C port

Apple will use the new USB-C port to replace the traditional Lightning port. This is likely the most unique and impressive Lightning port ever. Apple will use the new USB-C port to replace the traditional Lightning port According to some sources, Apple is planning to customize their own chip (IC) and integrate it into this port. Specifically, it holds the responsibility of intermediate validation with the accessory plugged into the phone. In addition, it helps to determine if it is compatible with the hardware inside the device.

New physical keys appear

For the iPhone 15 Pro Max version, we can see that the volume and silence buttons have been completely removed from the physical capabilities. Those function buttons are now no longer in the form of buttons, but have changed to haptic touch instead . The phone uses a unique haptic touch This conversion will make the phone more water resistant and more durable, as well as a design improvement that makes the phone look more modern and luxurious now.
